pinyin: Huang2 jia1 Xiang1 gang3 Jing3 cha2

definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
Hong Kong, abbr. for 香港[Xiang1 gang3]/surname Gang
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident
Special Duties Unit, Hong Kong special police
British colonial administration of Hong Kong 1837-1941 and 1945-1997
governor of Hong Kong (during the period of British rule, 1841-1997)
Independent Commission Against Corruption, Hong Kong (ICAC)
Chris Patten (1944-), last British Governor of Hong Kong 1992-1997
